thread.title: Zuckerberg says Facebook made 'mistakes' on data

title: Zuckerberg says Facebook made 'mistakes' on data
text:
Zuckerberg says Facebook made 'mistakes' on data 6:53am GMT - 01:29 
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg apologizes for mistakes his company made in how it handled data belonging to 50 million of its users and promised tougher steps to restrict developers' access to such information. Grace Lee   
Facebook Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg apologizes for mistakes his company made in how it handled data belonging to 50 million of its users and promised tougher steps to restrict developers' access to such information. Grace Lee  //reut.rs/2pxtfNx
